name: Swiss Quality Assurance with Pia Wiedermayer, Lead QA at Zühlke (Ship It! #45)
summary: Pia Wiedermayer, Lead QA at Zühlke, is talking with Gerhard today about software quality. If the name sounds familiar, check out episode 28. Thank you Romano for the introduction 👋🏻 Do you remember the last time that you used an app, whether it was in the browser or on your mobile, and everything just worked? What about...
